Back To Recipes

Clean counter space:

Empty dishwasher
Load dishwasher
Put away anything not related to recipe away

Get out the following ingredients:

Kale
Cooking Spray
Old Bay Seasoning

Recipe

Preheat oven to 300 degrees
Wash Kale
Break kale in 2 inch pieces and put on oven safe pan
Mist kale with cooking spray
Season with pepper
Season with Measuring tsp Old Bay Seasoning
Wait 25 minutes Bake in oven
Wait 2 minutes Let cool
